verses.verse: <S%G260>With<s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> would <S%G455>open<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%> a <S%G2374>door<s%> of <S%G3056>utterance<s%>, to <S%G2980>speak<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G1210>am<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G1210>bonds<s%>:

<S%G741>Let<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3056>speech<s%> be <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>, <S%G741>seasoned<s%> with <S%G217>salt<s%>, that you may <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G611>answer<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>man<s%>.

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G1691>my<s%> <S%G2596>affairs<s%> <S%G1107>shall<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus<s%> <S%G1107>declare<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, who is a <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1249>minister<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4889>fellowservant<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>:

<S%G4862>With<s%> <S%G3682>Onesimus<s%>, a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> one <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>. They shall make <S%G1107>known<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are done <S%G5602>here<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, which is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2459>Justus<s%>, who <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%>. <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> are my <S%G4904>fellowworkers<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> have <S%G1096>been<s%> a <S%G3931>comfort<s%> unto <S%G3427>me<s%>.

<S%G1889>Epaphras<s%>, who <S%G3588>is<s%> one <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G782>greets<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G3842>always<s%> labouring <S%G75>fervently<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4335>prayers<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4137>complete<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G782>Greet<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> which are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2993>Laodicea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3564>Nymphas<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> which is <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1992>letter<s%> is <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G3844>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G4160>cause<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it be <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2994>Laodiceans<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> letter <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G2993>Laodicea<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> to <S%G751>Archippus<s%>, Take care <S%G991>to<s%> the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G3880>received<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> you <S%G4137>fulfill<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>.

The <S%G783>salutation<s%> by the <S%G5495>hand<s%> of <S%G1699>me<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%>. <S%G3421>Remember<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1199>bonds<s%>. <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>. <S%G3682>Amen<s%>. Written from Rome to the Colossians by Tychicus and Onesimus.
